name: Pixel Shooter 2D 2
description:
PIXEL SHOOTER 2D 2

Survive!

Pixel shooter 2D 2 is a sequel/remaster to an old Scratch game I made! It's a round based arena shooter where you need to kill enemies to survive for as long as you can!

Kill zombies!

  • Default: 1 hp, 1 attack damage
  • Blue: 2 hp, 1 attack damage
  • Red: 2 hp, 1 attack damage, faster!
  • Black: 3 hp, 2 attack damage
  • Crawler: 1 hp, 1 attack damage, smaller hitbox

Fight with 2 different weapons !

  • Pistol: semi-auto, 2 damage per shot
  • Rifle: (Wave 7) fully automatic, 7 bullets per second, 1.5 damage per shot

And remember!

DON'T. TOUCH. THE. CACTUS.

How to play:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to shoot
  • Shift to slide
  • E to change weapons
  • ESC to pause

Check out the original!

Pixel Shooter 2D on Scratch (mit.edu)
